alert.note: Alert for Caswell (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 12:18AM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Caswell, southeastern Pittsylvania and southwestern Halifax Counties and the City of Danville through 1245 AM EDT... At 1217 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hitesburg to near South Boston to near Westover Hills. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Danville... South Boston... Yanceyville... Bethel... Halifax... Turbeville... and Providence. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
